name: Hoop City Manager
description: In this basketball simulation card game, you create your own team and try to defeat superstar-turned-manager LeMonathan Johnathan! This single-player indie game begins at the start of the 2022 basketball season. Instead of resigning with the Baskets, LeMonathan has decided to start his own league of overlooked players. Without anyone to manage the teams, he decides to hire several New York City locals. One of them happens to be you. Advance through the season, earn salary and coach your team to the championship in this 2D/3D Simulator!
